name: Dream Escape Room
description:
Dream Escape Room is a phrasal template text-based adventure game. Think Mad Libs but more interactive.

Fill out the prompts then try to solve the puzzle of the dream-like room you find yourself in. 

If you're stuck, try using the help command.

Made for exprmt48 2022 with jQuery Terminal.

Logo generated with Text to ASCII Art Generator by @patorjk
